mapper.insert: insert into qrtz_cron_triggers (SCHED_NAME, TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_GROUP, CRON_EXPRESSION, TIME_ZONE_ID) values (#{schedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{triggerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{triggerGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cronExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeZoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
